contest-event.event-date:
May 5, 1973 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright] Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:58 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 9:30 p.m. 1 Crookhall Colliery Michael Brand 2 Stalybridge Old Band Les Hine 3 British Vita Works Band John Harrison 4 Linthwaite Silver Band Gordon Pulleyn Unknown Result Laganvale Band Harry Brittain Unknown Result Hade Edge Jack Fisher Unknown Result Rochdale Band Norman Ashcroft Unknown Result Mossley Band Derek Ashmore Unknown Result Coventry Imperial Jon Hall Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Derek Broadbent Unknown Result BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Herbert H.
